entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is viewing a mysterious light source.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who is accompanying Harry.

entities.name: pensieve
entities.description: A magical device used by Dumbledore to store memories, which the basin resembles.

relationships.description: Harry is accompanied by Dumbledore as they view the mysterious light source.
The basin resembles Dumbledore's Pensieve, a magical device used to store memories.
